about.description: I'm a {age}-year-old guy from Houten, the Netherlands. I'm capable of both server / back-end development and web / front-end development.

profile.1: My name is Wessel van Dalen and I'm a Full Stack Software Engineer from the Netherlands. I build websites, servers & databases and discuss needs and wishes with customers. I have studied HBO ICT Software Development (4-years Bachelor degree) at the Hogeschool Utrecht in Utrecht, where I developed a high level of expertise in software engineering.
profile.2: I'm interested both in working in the Netherlands and Norway, since I speak both Dutch and Norwegian fluently. I am capable of working in a team both as a developer and a Scrum master / team leader, having been the team lead in all group projects during my study (and getting good feedback about it).
profile.3: In my freetime I like to take walks in nature with my dog Rowdy, like to work out at the local gym, play games I like and hang out with friends.

mysolution.text: The candidate onboarding portal, created for Mysolution, is a user-friendly platform for GrowWork customers. It enables candidates to easily submit their information, ensuring a smooth start at GrowWork. Streamlining paperwork and ensuring GDPR compliance, the portal simplifies the hiring process, offering an efficient, transparent experience for candidates and reducing administrative work for GrowWork.

hu.text: Smart Finance is an innovative application designed for business students to generate annual financial statements for practice and learning. By simulating real-world financial scenarios, the app enables users to deepen their understanding of accounting principles, financial analysis, and reporting standards. This hands-on approach enhances learning outcomes, equipping students with essential skills for their future careers in finance.

languages.title: Languages
languages.description: Born and raised with Dutch with English learned at school. Norwegian learned through self-study, friends, games/tv-shows/books/podcasts and vacations.

frontend.description: Specialised in user-friendly, good-looking and accessable websites.

backend.description: Very skilled in building complex back-end systems incl. databases, especially in Java / likewise languages.

security.description: Deep knowledge about different security aspects - from cybersecurity threats to building own Security Configurations.

tools.title: Tools
tools.description: Tools I work with / know my way around with.
